articles.title: A song of ice and fire: When Virender Sehwag and Rahul Dravid fell 3 runs short of a 50-year-old record - The Indian Express
articles.description: Virender Sehwag said later he had not known the world record for the highest ever Test opening partnership had been on the line but that it would not have changed the shot he played anyway.
